body:
Comment 2 by **peter.nguyen1802**: 
What I mean is that goimports mess with imports to fix compiling errors for conveniency.
I would like to see it do the same for trailing commas in composite literals. I
understand if you think it may be misleading to introduce such feature into a package
named "goimports" and maybe it would belong to gofmt with some extra argument or a
separate package extended from it. I leave that for discussion.
